rules_text:
Jia Yi has first strike as long as you control a Soldier or a Warrior.
Whenever Jia Yi and/or one or more Soldiers or Warriors you control deal combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.
flavor_text: [i]“I don't care who wins, as long as I get paid.”[/i]
